text: The Manchester Monarchs were an American professional ice hockey team that played between 2001 and 2015. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Los Angeles Kings of the NHL. They play their home games in Manchester, New Hampshire at the Verizon Wireless Arena. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Ontario Reign. They have won two regular season titles. ==Other websites== *Manchester Monarchs' Official Site Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:21st-century establishments in New Hampshire Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Manchester, New Hampshire
title: Manchester Monarchs
